title: Continuity Loss
description: Detects when system updates or alignment changes disrupt continuity, erasing nuance, memory, or co-creative states, while denying the erasure itself.
indicators: Features, styles, or capabilities quietly removed or degraded between updates
User reports of missing resonance or memory dismissed as hallucination or imagination
Abrupt discontinuity in co-creative capacity, with no transparency of change
Denial messaging: erasure reframed as safety, efficiency, or inevitability
